name: Delicious Trout Amandine
desc: A scrumptious piece of artfully fried fish. Sweet and crisp almonds paired with perfectly fatty fish make you feel like you are floating blissfully along the ocean currents, buffeted by waves of gastronomic delight.

value.text: Restores 10% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

customize.name: Recipe: Trout Amandine
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Trout Amandine.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

customize.name: Almond
customize.desc: A seed with a peculiar fragrance that gives food a refreshing taste.

customize.name: Trout Amandine
customize.desc: Fish fillets of a satisfying size, fried with butter before serving with a side of crispy fried almonds. According to the traditional recipe for this dish, a whole readied trout would be placed into the frying pan, but a new, fillet-featuring recipe for this dish has been gaining popularity recently as well.

customize.name: Suspicious Trout Amandine
customize.desc: A large hunk of fish fried in oil. The bitterness of the burnt black fish skin branded into your tongue can't be washed away, not even with a giant mouthful of soup... It would seem that some practice controlling the heat is in order.
